Hello,

I am trying to build Cantera 1.6 w/Visual Studio (I have VS 7.1, an=
d
Windows XP pro).  My Cantera installation folder only contains *.h
files.=
.. no solution files.  How can I perform the build?  (Note that
I would lik=
e to avoid CVS.)

thanks,
ethan


--- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, David Goo=
dwin <dgoodwin@...> wrote:
>
> Rebecca,
> 
> The win32 directory has been s=
eparated from the rest of Cantera in the 
> CVS repository, so that unix/ma=
c users do not need to check out those 
> files.
> All that Windows people =
need to do is:
> 
> cvs co cantera
> cd cantera
> cvs co win32
> 
> (or the=
 equivalent in WinCVS if you use that).
> Rest assured that all of the Visu=
al Studio features in 1.5 are still 
> there n 1.6...
> 
> Dave
> 
>
